ygData.subject: All Phobias, I mean KitKats followers read.
ygData.msgSnippet: As you wish Phobia turns and exits the CR room and opens a commlink. Destructor, KitKat wishes to see you now. He opens a long range communication

"As you wish" Phobia turns and exits the CR room and opens a 
commlink. "Destructor, KitKat wishes to see you now." 

He opens a long range communication "Starscreem this is Phobia try to 
arrange a battle plan with the alliance to take down Megatron. I'll 
be in touch with the details Phobia out."

"Bludgeon, Drillbit report to the CR room."

OOC is the alliance member still with them (Bloodystrike)

Phobia opens a channel to his baby "Dollen, I know you can hear me, 
report to these coordinates immediately, if you're not with us you're 
against us." he closes the channel and awaits everyones response.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She smiled at Phobia, "Yes. That is a good plan. We shall go with 
> that. See if you can't contact the others and get them here as soon 
> as possable.  Once they get here, we can go and put an end to 
> Megatron once and for all."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Phobia knew that question was coming. "Why both of course, we 
> already 
> > have an operative discussing things with the alliance and we can 
> work 
> > our edge here without much effort we'll have them both playing 
for 
> > the same goal, we can pick a more permanent interest when we've 
> > accomplished a common goal, the death of Megatron."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::KitKat::
> > > 
> > > She nodded, "I agree. We should get our forces together. Whom 
> would 
> > > you consider joining, Destuctor or the allience?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > "I think we should consider our resources. Destructor offered 
> us 
> > > > help, the alliance offered us help, I think we should move 
one 
> > step 
> > > > at a time. We have a five bot group right now, Destructor 
makes 
> > > six, 
> > > > Dollen and GoldenEye will be back soon theres eight add the 
> > > alliance 
> > > > forces and we'll have a small army working with us, and then, 
> > then 
> > > > followers will join us or fall before us, and Megatron will 
be 
> > our 
> > > > first victim." Phobias eyes lit up at the prospect of being 
the 
> > bot 
> > > > behind the bot who joined the forces of Predacon and 
Alliance, 
> > > being 
> > > > the unknown shadow that the great leaders throughout history 
> have 
> > > > cast. 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > ::KitKat::
> > > > > 
> > > > > She thought about the situation.  She didn't know the bots 
> who 
> > > were 
> > > > > so far, helping htem out.  Usually when one helped, they 
> > expected 
> > > > the 
> > > > > favor returned, and with more in return than what was 
> offered.  
> > > She 
> > > > > looked at Phobia,"Tell me, who is this Destrustor?  And why 
> did 
> > > he 
> > > > > help us? No Pred would just help and expect nothing in 
> return. 
> > > > Also, 
> > > > > if Megatron is without followers, who does that leave us 
> with? 
> > I 
> > > > > heard that most of our groups is gone."  She looked down 
and 
> > > > > sighed. "I know that I can only trust you and Drillbit 
right 
> > now."
> > > > > She looked up at Phobia.  "I think it would be best if we 
> > takled 
> > > to 
> > > > > this Desctuctor. Then we need to get our group together.  
I  
> > know 
> > > > I"m 
> > > > > not the only one who wants to get Megatron for deserting 
us.  
> > And 
> > > > > once Megatron is done with, we can then start looking for a 
> > base 
> > > of 
> > > > > our own.  BUt Megatron has to be delt with. As long as he 
is 
> > > > around, 
> > > > > we will never have a moment's rest.  After that," she 
> suddenly 
> > > had 
> > > > an 
> > > > > angry look on her face,"After that, I want to pay back 
those 
> > > > slagging 
> > > > > maximals." She relaxed, "What do you think Phobia?"
